summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Sales Agent for Telegram + Bitrix24 CRM. Backend APIs fully functional (16/16 tests passed). Frontend working after CSS fix. All core features tested successfully including authentication, dashboard, connections, and Telegram bot integration.
passed_tests: Dashboard stats and leads per day endpoints
Frontend login page UI and form validation
Dashboard page with stats cards and charts
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Leads, Connections, Sales Agent, Knowledge Base)
Dark theme implementation with proper fonts (Manrope/Inter)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major UI flows working, minor session timeout during extended testing)
